title: Basic to Advance DSA with 200+ Problems
description: Learn DSA from basics to advanced with 200+ problems and live coding sessions in class. Solve guided assignments covering intermediate to advanced-level challenges to build strong problem-solving skills.

title: Master System Design (HLD + LLD)
description: Build scalable, high-performance applications with real-world architectural patterns.Learn to design robust backend systems, optimize databases, caching, and load balancing, and solve real-world scalability challenges

subItems.text: Crack System Design Interviews at Top Tech Companies

title: Specialise in GenAI For Software Developer
description: Prepare with problems from top tech companies like <IBMLogo />, <GoogleLogo />, and <AmazonLogo /> covering coding, system design, and machine coding rounds.

title: Gain Real Experience with Real Projects
description: Gain hands-on experience by working on real-world software development projects in a structured DevLab environment. Learn by coding, and deploying like a real software developer.
